text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
— We've returned in a bakushin……!! 
Hoh! While we were running through 
the country the cherry blossoms have…!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
It shows how many places we visited on the way! 
Hehe, it's been a fun journey♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
It has! And I'm certain many people all throughout 
the country have had a lot of fun as well…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, yes! Let us have a little peek at just how much people have enjoyed themselves!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If we simply look at the comments left on the videos 
I have posted about our adventures on Umatter…!

!? Them bakushin lassies were over in me hometown!!? 
An' thems lookin' like havin' a belly full a laughs as well ^^) 
Oh, the joys!

I was pretty down about the lack of hanami, but having 
Chiyo and friends come over cheered me right up!!

Everybody'd been waitin' for the Sakura trio to come 
on over from the far south… It almost be like the actual 
cherry blossom front, hahaha.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: There are so many comments…! And even more neighces and rehonses!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Mmm! I'd say it's been a great success!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: A grand victory, huh… Then it's time for that, wouldn't you say?
